title: # 486 - Howie Mandel & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with legendary comedian, Howie Mandel. We talk about mental health, how he became the host of Deal Or No Deal, Norm Macdonald, pranks, answering a fan’s call, and much more!  

Howie has a new documentary “But Enough About Me” available on Peacock! 

Follow Howie here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/howiemandel 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/howiemandel 

Howie’s Podcast - https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/howie-mandel-does-stuff-podcast/id1555137542 

 

This episode is brought to you by Fight Camp. Get free shipping at http://www.joinfightcamp.com/bert  

 

This episode is also brought to you by Podium. Go to http://www.podium.com/bert and get started today for free.

 

This episode is brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

 

This episode is also brought to you by 3CHi. Go to http://www.3chi.com and use the code “BERT” at checkout for 5% off your order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
